state.response: بھیڑ پالنے والے اپنے گلہ کی انفرادی بھیڑوں کو شناخت کرنے کے لئے انہیں رنگ سکتے ہیں۔

بھیڑ پالنے والے بھیڑوں کو شناخت کرنے کے: Can shepherds identify sheep by coloring them? Methods shepherds use to identify sheep

The painted colors identify them with the farm/farmer who owns them. We know sheep are prone to wander, and this is an efficient system for quickly identify who they belong to. #shamrockandpeachtours (This is our wonderful shepherd Michael Hastings who told us the best stories about his career working with sheep)!
Can shepherds identify sheep by coloring them? Methods shepherds use to identify sheep

There are many methods to identify sheep and lambs, with ear tags being the most common. Ear tags come in many different sizes, designs, and brands. There are brass, aluminum, and plastic tags; button tags, rotary tags, swivel tags, and looping tags; DNA tags, and RFID (electronic tags).
